achievements.name: Chasm Conqueror
achievements.desc: Light up The Chasm surface map.

achievements.name: Perilous Plunge
achievements.desc: Light up The Chasm: Underground Mines map.

achievements.name: Into the Depths
achievements.desc: Unlock all Teleport Waypoints in The Chasm and its Underground Mines.

achievements.name: Gorge Guide
achievements.desc: Follow 6 Seelie in The Chasm to their Seelie Courts.

achievements.name: Gorge Guide
achievements.desc: Follow 12 Seelie in The Chasm to their Seelie Courts.

achievements.name: Gorge Guide
achievements.desc: Follow 24 Seelie in The Chasm to their Seelie Courts.

achievements.name: Chasm Adventurer
achievements.desc: Complete 3 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in The Chasm.

achievements.name: Chasm Adventurer
achievements.desc: Complete 6 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in The Chasm.

achievements.name: Chasm Adventurer
achievements.desc: Complete 12 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in The Chasm.

achievements.name: Arch-Illuminator
achievements.desc: Enhance the Lumenstone Adjuvant to its highest possible level.

achievements.name: "When the Seal Is Broken..."
achievements.desc: Remove the obstacles to your entry into the mines.

achievements.name: Exploration Underway
achievements.desc: Complete the exploration commission from the Ministry of Civil Affairs.
